aboutme_page.presentation_about: Hello! A developer passionate about creating web and mobile applications. I love learning new technologies and constantly improving my skills.
aboutme_page.about_me_desc: I am a software developer passionate about technology and creating unique digital experiences. I specialize in React, Kotlin, and AI development.
aboutme_page.purpose_desc: I love learning new technologies, working on innovative projects, and creating applications that truly add value. I especially enjoy developing video games and exploring artificial intelligence.
